briefTitle: Multicenter Study of Antiarrhythmic Medications for Treatment of Infants With Supraventricular Tachycardia

outcomeMeasures.title: Incidence of Recurrent Supraventricular Tachycardia (SVT) Requiring Medical Intervention to Terminate the Episode.
